cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Energy and Commerce on June 10, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 2931, Enhancing Grid Security through Public-Private Partnerships Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 75 (Friday, April 30, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. McNERNEY:
H.R. 2931.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 of the Constitution of the United
States grants Congress the authority to enact this bill.
[Page H2135]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

title: Enhancing Grid Security through Public-Private Partnerships Act
